note: 2125 B.C.E. Sumerians around the city of Ur on the Euphrates reunite and gain independence.
title: Gilgamesh, hero of Sumerian legends, reigns as king of Uruk. 2500 B.C.E. Epic tale of Gilgamesh is written. 2300 B.C.E. Akkadians led by Sargon I attack and conquer Sumerian city-states
Amorites from the Syrian desert migrate to Mesopotamia and construct their own city-states. Hammurabi ascends Babylonian throne
